#Text= Bolin says : " I 'm on my way to the big finale for " Nuktuk : Hero of the South . "

column1: #Text=Yeah , everyone 's gon na be there except for , you know , you ... because you 're in jail and stuff .
#Text=" Mako says : " Thanks for the reminder .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey , I brought you something .
#Text=I thought this would brighten up your new place .
#Text=Read the inscription .
#Text=" Mako says : " " Dear Mako , Nuktuk says , ' Keep smiling . ' "
#Text=Did you come by just to give me a poster ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , I came by to give you my sincere , heartfelt words of encouragement .
#Text=I know our lives have been moving in two different directions , but I want you to know that I will always be there for you .
#Text=We are brothers , after all , even if one of us is a member of high society and the other one is a criminal .
#Text=" Mako says : " I am not a criminal !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Of course I know that , but you do kinda look like one , cause you 're in a jail and that 's where criminals live .
#Text=" Mako says : " I was set up !
#Text=Varrick knew I had figured out he was hiring gangsters to pose as Northern soldiers to get Republic City to join the war .
#Text=That 's why he had me arrested .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ah , I see what you 're doing .
#Text=You 're going for the insanity defense .
#Text=Smart .
#Text=" Mako says : " No !
#Text=I 'm trying to tell you that Varrick is n't what he seems .
#Text=Where 's Asami ?
#Text=She 'll listen to me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I asked her to come , but she said it was too hard for her .
#Text=You being in jail like this reminds her of her dad .
#Text=Okay , got ta run , but I 'll be back tomorrow .
#Text=And I am gon na get you the best attorney fame and fortune can buy .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , wait .
#Text=If my theory about Varrick is right , something might go down tonight at your premiere .
#Text=Promise me you 'll keep your eyes peeled .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , okay , big brother .
#Text=I promise .
#Text=Whew !
#Text=That insanity defense is definitely gon na work .
#Text="
